quote_first: On arriving at platform one at Sevenoaks station, he would purchase a copy of the Daily Express before boarding the
quote_raw: On arriving at platform one at Sevenoaks station, he would purchase a copy of the Daily Express before boarding the 8:27 to Cannon Street.
title: Broken Routine
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: Even dawdling over breakfast with my mother just killed an hour, and though I hadn't planned to be at Marge's until nine, I was knocking on her door at
quote_raw: Even dawdling over breakfast with my mother just killed an hour, and though I hadn't planned to be at Marge's until nine, I was knocking on her door at twenty-seven minutes past eight.
title: Fatally Frosted
author: Jessica Beck

quote_first: The lecture was to be given tomorrow, and it was now
quote_raw: The lecture was to be given tomorrow, and it was now almost eight-thirty.
title: A Confederacy of Dunces
author: John Kennedy Toole
